title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Software-Enhanced Mathematics Courses for Supporting Inquiry-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of elementary mathematical concepts and basic proficiency in mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners enhance data analysis and visualization skills by utilizing software tools during mathematical problem-solving processes.

Over six months, learners select 3 complex mathematical concepts in medical/nursing fields (e.g., medication dosage calculation, statistical analysis) using digital scaffolding tools (e.g., concept map generators, step-by-step problem-solving templates). They complete 3-tier inquiry learning processes (basic-application-integration) per concept, achieving ≥80% accuracy in final assessments
Learners share inquiry results with peers via collaborative features in mobile environments and propose improvements reflecting feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
